attributes.action: Stop quarantine rules when travelling if you have a negative covid test.
attributes.additional_details:
Squash the quarantine rules if the initial covid test is negative.
Stop over priced companies selling test for over 40£.
I’ve spent nearly 200£ for my three test on top of over priced plane tickets
attributes.background: It does not make sense to tell us the people; that they need a test before travel, only then to also need quarantine 10 days after. It also doesn’t make sense that we need to pay to two test after. It is becoming a money making scheme! The cost of travel has become so difficult and confusing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

No quarantine in the UK if you present a COVID-19 PCR test or you are vaccinated:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586691
